A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great action but bad plot. Whats the deal with Luke Skywalker? Very child like attitude. The plot was a mess. There are questions not answerd from Ep VII. Who was Snoke? Is this gonna be addressed in Ep IX? What about the jokes. Very unfunny and forced\, at least to me. The casino planet was boring and the subplot with Finn and Rose felt pointless. Hope that on Ep IX the plot holes are revealed.
